info.description: RESTful API for IPL Backend Service with menu management

get.description: Get all master menus with pagination

post.description: Create a new master menu with the provided information

get.description: Get master menu information by ID
Get list of menus accessible by a specific user ID

delete.description: Delete role menu by ID and its associations

404.description: Role menu or master menu not found

delete.description: Detach a role from a role menu

get.description: Get all role menus associated with a specific role

get.description: Get detailed user information by profile ID
